attributes.action: Adopt the Euro as Great Britain's currency abolishing the  pound sterling for good!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For financial reasons (lower mortgage interest rate...), to make our lives easier while traveling or investing abroad, to create a trully super economic power alongside our cotinental partners, or simply because you fancy the Euro's good looking.
Whatever's your reason please sign the petition and spread the word, thank you all.
